name: Solitaire Mystery
description:
Solitaire Mystery is a thrilling solitaire experience, where you must find and collect cards hidden throughout the room!

Play through 40 unique scenarios and earn your way up the detective ranks. Along the way, you’ll be tasked to search for hidden clues that are spread around the 200 levels!

Earn achievements while collecting cards, stacking up combos, and solving mystery cases in each town!
